page.title: 16Sutton Court farm
page.content: There are 200 acres of land at Sutton Court farm.It is run by a manager who has worked at the farm for 28yrs.Before that he worked at 3 other farms,and usually works 10 hours a day.He is not sure how old the farm is. The farmers wife works in the PYO farm,weighing boxs of fruit.There is 1 other full time worker on the farm. There is no farm dog because he has no animals to look after or feed. Sutton Court grows barley,greens, plums,gooseberries,raspberries,rhubarb and blackberries.There are 2 barns and quite a lot of machinery-4 tractors,4 sprayers,1 cultivator,4 seed drills and a few more. The produce is sold at the PYO farm and pre-packed for Safeways.Last year the harvest was bad,this year it is average.
